bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Health informatics
Point-of-care medical device communication
Interface profile -- Cabled Ethernet
IEEE Draft Standard for Health informatics - Point-of-care medical device communication - Interface profile -- Cabled Ethernet
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P111073-30400/D10, Jan 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document focuses on the application of the Ethernet family (IEEE 802.3TM) of protocols for use in medical device communication. The scope is limited to referencing the appropriate Ethernet family specifications and calling out any specific special needs or requirements of the ISO/IEEE 11073TM environment, with a particular focus on easing interoperability and controlling costs.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
